name: @schuchard/prettier
description: An Angular schematic for adding prettier

scripts.test:sandbox: cd sandbox && run-s lint test e2e build
scripts.clean: git checkout HEAD -- sandbox && git clean -f -d sandbox
scripts.launch:schematic: yarn link:sandbox && cd sandbox && yarn && yarn ng g @schuchard/prettier:add
scripts.launch:schematic:noPrompts: yarn link:sandbox && cd sandbox && yarn && yarn ng g @schuchard/prettier:add --printWidth=100 --tabWidth=2 --semi=true --singleQuote=true --trailingComma=es5 --lintStaged=true --formatAllAngularFiles=true
scripts.build:clean:launch: run-s build:once clean launch:schematic:noPrompts && cd sandbox && yarn prettier
scripts.link:sandbox: yarn link && cd sandbox && yarn link "@schuchard/prettier"

author: Kevin Schuchard <schuchard.kevin@gmail.com>
